record.title: ORDER FOR ADJOURNMENT

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that at the conclusion or yielding back of the time controlled by Senator Salazar, Senator Warner be recognized for up to 10 minutes, and that at the conclusion of Senator Warner's remarks, the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I appreciate the consideration of my colleagues for letting me squeeze in time to complete the Senate's work for today and to say a few nice things about the great Lady Bird Johnson.
